text: <@U0Z41KY5V> on the TSC call just now, <@U0TH5GUQ6> said there is a slight preference for someone in SFO, NYC, or London, but the very strong preference is for good people for the roles. I do know LF has employees in Australia and Japan, and probably other places as well that I'm unaware of
Thanks ry! yeap, i’m on the call :slightly_smiling_face:
oh, sorry, I didn't see you on there. Glad you could make the call
<@U0J038AJK> <@U0TH5GUQ6> update: i talked with <@U0YQK8WSV> after the meeting, and he would like to offer help to draft the charter for fabric sdk WG. Thanks pardha!
<@U0UHG4VP1> yeap, i connected with phone, however, cannot open the software client due to network problem :disappointed:
Anyone have recommendations on a collaborative diagramming tool?
Ideally it would produce artifacts we could also check into git.
<@U0VKPD6A2> dear dan, you can have a look at <http://mural.co|mural.co>, for remote design, and hope can meet some of your requirement.
And there’s also a <https://cacoo.com/> for diagram specially.

attachments.title: Online Diagram and Flowchart Software | Cacoo
attachments.text: Online diagram software to create and securely share flowcharts, wireframes, UML models, network diagram and more. Get started for free today!
attachments.fallback: Online Diagram and Flowchart Software | Cacoo
